In addition , examine effect drug expression gene within prostate . Acyline suppress LH FSH , hormone make pituitary gland , thus block signal brain cause testis make testosterone . Therefore , Acyline block testosterone production . In preliminary study , single injection Acyline reversibly lower FSH , LH testosterone level blood approximately 15 day . Prolonged low level LH FSH cause suppression sperm production normal men . However , men may experience side effect low level testosterone cause acyline , thus exogenous testosterone require sustain normal male androgen organ effect without suppress spermatogenesis . This combination drug promise male contraceptive regimen . In addition , million older men use testosterone replacement treat male `` andropause '' ; low level testosterone associate age . However , effect testosterone prostate unknown . Studies examine effect testosterone prostate need .
DOC.criteria: Males 35 55 , normal serum testosterone level , normal gonadal function History prostate cancer , PSA > 2.0 , AUA BPH symptom score > 10 , History testosterone anabolic steroid use , chronic medical illness prostate disease , active serious infection immunosuppression , history bleed disorder need anticoagulation , abnormal digital rectal exam , abnormal prostate ultrasound , first degree relative history prostate cancer
